attributes.title: horrible app don’t recommend
attributes.review: it took about 24 hours to download and when it did download it started playing my music on all the speakers in the house. it had lots of false information to would not recommend using it as a primary source. i also was shown ads for some interesting things like a hair piece. overall i would not want this app anymore or think anyone should use it.

attributes.title: worst app possibly made
attributes.review: this app made my brand new phone glitch and then eventually turn all the way off, i had to call apple support just to get it fixed, i wouldn't recommend this app even over my dead body, this app has caused so many problems, and i had only had it not even 3 days, if your thinking about getting the app, your wasting your time and could be using it elsewhere.

attributes.title: This Is BS
attributes.review: When downloading the app I had a huge glitch in my phone and the only thing would come up is orange and I’m pretty sure I saw the president and it was very scary experience please get this obsoleted before I lose my mind!!!!

attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.title: Just horrible!
